text: Martin Bayer (born 20 December 1972) is a Slovak skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1992 Winter Olympics and the 1994 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Czechoslovakia Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Slovakia Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1994 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Poprad
title: Martin Bayer
